title: Fantasy Beauty Long Wavy Hair Two Tone Black and Grey Ombre Wig Heat Resistant Fiber Synthetic Lace Front Wigs Half Hand Tied (24 Inch)
features: Half Hand Tied Lace Front Wig with Lace 2.5 Inches Parting Space in Front
Circumference 22.5 Inches Stretched Medium Cap (Average Cap Size) with Adjustable Straps and 3 Combs
Synthetic Hair Heat Resistant up to 180 Degrees Centigrade
Same Color And Hair Style As Pic
description: 1.Parting Space: There are lace in front so that you could make the parting as you want, its own parting space is about 2.5-3 inches, the more side you make the part, the less parting you could make, in the side, the parting space is about 1.5-2 inches 2.Wig Combs: There are 3 combs inside to help you fix the wig on your head, once is in the front, and the other 2 is on the 2 sides near from ear 3.Adjustable Straps: There are 2 adjustable straps in the back which could help you adjust the wig cap size to fit for the different head size 4.Color Issue: The color of this wig is ombre black roots to grey There will be a little color difference between the different monitors 6.How To Avoid Tangle And Shedding: (1)Use the proper shampoo and conditioner—a very mild, not-stripping shampoo, and both products should be sulfate-free and have a low pH (2)You could use a product called“Knot Sealer" (3)Do not to blow dry the hair with a high setting since otherwise the knots may be damaged or split, just let it air-dry or in low temperature (4)Do not sleeping with the wig wear on. (5)Do not wash the wig frequent, wash your wig about every three weeks or 2 weeks in the summer
